query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Report of sustainable design and manufacturing methods
result.description: Implementation of sustainable design and manufacturing methods in production process, utilising the results of sustainable impact analysis results, together with eco-points method and the traceability techniques. Within the production process, co-creation with consumers and actors along the supply chain is to be achieved with the approaches developed. Linked to Task 1.5.

result.title: Technology Round-up and Market Readiness Report – first iteration
result.description: The Technology Round-up is an eMagazine designed for cross-unit fertilisation. It is thematically structured and features articles and success stories (e.g. technology breakthroughs, new services/solutions/deployments), and snapshots on new projects. The eMagazine is circulated 1-month after Concertation meetings as a round-up of key outcomes with coverage of the prize winners. The related Market Readiness Report provides a concise analysis of the emerging value propositions for the marketplace, sustainability strategies and business models, and identifies opportunities for OSS re-use. As content of this deliverble is dependant on the timing of Concertation meeting, the delivery date may change. The document will be delivered at the end of the month after the Concertation meeting.

result.title: A Video News Release for TV distribution
result.description: This deliverable will develop a final Video News Release (VNR) focusing on innovative outcomes raising media and public interest. The video will be produced and distributed to European and Word TV stations through youris.com audiovisual platform, managed by IFO, and by exploiting the satellite gateways of the Eurovision department of the European Broadcasting Union (EBU).

result.title: Report on international collaborations in RTR
result.description: The report will highlight strategic international cooperation opportunities that would deliver substantial mutual benefits between the European Union and the partner regions and entities in relation to pursuing longterm sustainability in the road transport sector and its value chains particularly in view of current and imminent crises The report shall also highlight optimal approaches for pursuing such collaboration opportunities based on the analyses and consultations done in the other relevant tasks T12 T21 T22
